summary.para: Creates an instance of the interface based on a given file.

param.name: pszPath
param.para: The path of the file containing the image. If this parameter is NULL, an unhandled exception results.

param.name: ppshimg
param.para: The address of a pointer to an instance of .

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

description.para: The internal object cannot be instantiated.
The internal object does not support the or interfaces.

remarks.para: An access violation occurs if pszPath is NULL.

summary.para: Creates an instance of the interface based on a given file stream.

param.name: pStream
param.para: A pointer to the image stream.

param.name: ppshimg
param.para: The address of a pointer to an instance of .

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

description.para: The internal object cannot be instantiated.
The internal object does not support the or interfaces.

remarks.para: If pStream is NULL or an invalid pointer, later calls to will cause an access violation.

summary.para: Creates an instance of the interface.

param.name: ppshimg
param.para: The address of a pointer to an instance of .

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

description.para: The internal object cannot be instantiated.
The internal object does not support .

summary.para: Determines a file's format based on its extension.

param.name: pDataFormat
param.para: A pointer to a GUID identifying the image format of the file.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful, or an error value otherwise, including the following:

description.para: The pszPath parameter is NULL, the file name extension does not correspond to any defined GDI+ decoder, or an internal error has occurred. In any of these cases, pDataFormat is set to GUID_NULL.
The internal object cannot be instantiated.

remarks.para: IShellImageDataFactory.GetDataFormatFromPath should only be used to determine whether data can be saved to a particular format on the current system.

summary.para: Exposes methods that create instances based on various image sources.

remarks.para: This interface is not expected to be available in later versions of Windows. It is recommended that Windows GDI+ APIs be used in place of IShellImageDataFactory methods.
This interface was not included in a public header file prior to Windows Vista.
